channel.title: 317 webclient error , "error occured whilst loading runescape"
channel.description:
Haay Moparscapers!
I got this nasty "error occured whilst loading runescape" on my webclient!
when i double click the .jar on my desktop it works just fine , but on my website it gives me this error :/
it is jared/signd , downloading cache works too , only this error is killing me :o
i hope you guys can help me!
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/90okrd.png[/img]

item.title: 317 webclient error , "error occured whilst loading runescape"
item.dc:creator: @Celeron Celeron
item.description:
@Celeron wrote:

the server is online for sure , all works fine except for the client , when i start the .jar at my computer it works but when i open the client as webclient on my website i get this error:

404 - Leider nichts gefunden.

Vielleicht ist die Seite einfach verschwunden, vielleicht haben wir sie

Fest steht: Hier ist nichts.

and here the link for the client.jar

u can test it out too , webclient is fucked up but the same client.jar as the one on the website works when u start it on your desktop!

item.title: 317 webclient error , "error occured whilst loading runescape"
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Something in the cache may be corrupt but I’m not entirely sure why it is not loading.
I did a few things to fix mine.

  1. Redownloaded the cache.
  2. Replaced my client.java with my other one.
  3. Restarted my comp.
    There’s more i just cant remember them all.
